name: (Never) Alone in the Dark
description:
Created for the Aotearoa Game Jame 2021 by myself as a team of one.

(Never) Alone in the Dark, explores themes around mental health and how it can restrict and dictate pathways to success. 

_______

This was made in under 48 hours while looking after my 4-month-old daughter. So a bunch of features didn't make it in. Thanks a lot for having a play.
